title: Please Murder Me (1956 film noir)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0049621/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0049621/</a>

A good, dark femme-fatale, very B-ish noir, with Lansbury and Burr at their humiliated, suffering best. The courtroom scene is entirely too long, but I suppose that is a problem with most courtroom scenes. The rest is pretty good, in a B-movie way. I've enjoyed it 3 or 4 times... but then, I have no life :-) I especially like the pulpy pre-title sequence.

*****************

Please seed at least 1:1, a bit more if you can. Thank you.
